## rename() function

Return a selection mapping that renames columns with a prefix.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function rename(table: ColumnTable, prefix: string, exclude?: string[]): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  table | ColumnTable | table to enumerate and rename columns |
|  prefix | string | prefix to add to column names |
|  exclude | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> exclusion list if you want to retain some original columns |

<b>Returns:</b>

any
